grammar

Generic Language Constructs. See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Predicate_(grammar)

Note that ! and ? are more definite sentence enders than .

enum char[] englishVowels;
English Vowels.

bool isEnglishVowel(C)(C c) if (isSomeChar!C);

Check if is a Swedish soft vowel.

enum Mood: ubyte;
(Grammatical) Mood. Sometimes also called Mode. Modus in Swedish. See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grammatical_mood

pure nothrow @nogc @safe bool isRealis(Mood mood);
Check if is a Realis Mood. See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grammatical_mood#Realis_moods

pure nothrow @nogc @safe bool isIrrealis(Mood mood);
Check if is a Irrealis Mood. See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grammatical_mood#Irrealis_moods
